00027                 void UncheckedSetKey(const byte *userKey, unsigned int length, const NameValuePairs &params);
00028                 unsigned int OptimalDataAlignment() const {return GetAlignmentOf<word16>();}

00031                 FixedSizeSecBlock<word16, 64> K;  // expanded key table

00042         public:
00043                 void ProcessAndXorBlock(const byte *inBlock, const byte *xorBlock, byte *outBlock) const;
00044         };
